title: Japan’s SoftBank in talks to invest up to $30 billion more in OpenAI, valuing ChatGPT owner at $830 billion: Report

title: AI ‘eye scan’ offers new way to detect diabetes without blood tests
description: New research finds artificial intelligence spots early signs of diabetes and prediabetes with 95% accuracy, offering a non-invasive alternative to blood tests
content:
